summary: This mod adds craftable weapons from Capcoms game \"Monster Hunter\" into the world of Skyrim. So far there are 3 weapons available, I will keep updating the mod with more weapons and stuff like armor, shields, books, misc items and more!
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]hyR99A9IGYM[/youtube][/center]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8975]Also available at the Steam Workshop![/url]

[b]Attention![/b]
I upload additional files, high res versions of the weapon textures. Why? Because it looks like steam limits it\'s filesize to ~60mb so I had to cut the texture size to the half. The changes aren\'t thaaat noticeable and I think it\'s better for those with a middle class PC. But if you prefer razor-sharp-looking weapon, download the pack.

[u]Changes of the new version[/u]
[list]
[*]Added the first Longsword: The Guardian Sword
[*]Fixed the Assassins Dagger bug
[/list]

[u]Preview for the next possible updates:[/u]
[list]
[*]Guardian Sword
[*]a bow :)
[/list]

[b]If you are a modeler/texturist and you\'d like to contribute something, PM me. I always look for some help. High-Quality models and textures are always appreciated.[/b]

[u]Description:[/u]

This mod adds craftable weapons from Capcoms game \"Monster Hunter\" into the world of Skyrim. All the weapons are completely new and user-made models with from-the-scratch made, high detailed texture.

I will constantly update the mod with new weapons and features such as armor, shields, books and misc items.

[u]Version 1.1.5 features:[/u]

8 craftable weapons:[list]
[*]Assassin\'s Dagger
[*]Odyssey
[*]Frost Edge
[*]Buster Sword
[*]Iron Greatsword
[*]Carbalite Sword
[*]Ravager Blade
[*]Guardian Sword[/list]
All weapons are craftable at any forge in the category \"Misc\".
They\'re also upgradeable (tested at the normal smith in Whiterun near the gates).

5 Books containing info-material from the game:[list]
[*]Infomagazine \"Practical Hunting - Sword and Shield\"
[*]Infomagazine \"Practical Hunting - Greatswords\"
[*]Infomagazine \"Practical Hunting - Wyvern (1+2+3)\"
(buyable at Belethor\'s Shop in Whiterun)[/list]

2 new misc items:[list]
[*]Monster Bone (you can get them from wolves and ice wolves)
[*]Ice Crystal (you can get them from ice-wolves[/list]

Please note that I try to keep it really close to Monster Hunter, this includes e.g. the size of the weapons and the needed \"ingredients\" to craft the weapons.

[b]Credits:[/b]
747823 - [i]Textures[/i]
cR45h - [i]Textures[/i]
Syncing - [i]rest (model, uv, bake, nif, collision, etc)[/i]
author: Syncing
